00025 int createAnalysisTables(sqlite3 *db) {
00026     int rc;
00027     char *errmsg;
00028 
00029 
00030     const char attachsql[] = "ATTACH DATABASE \":memory:\" AS analysis";
00031 
00032     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, attachsql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00033         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", attachsql, rc, errmsg);
00034         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00035         return -1;
00036     }
00037 
00038     const char gpssql[] = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS analysis.gpsanalysis "
00039                 "(trip INTEGER UNIQUE, length REAL, "
00040                 "meanlat REAL, meanlon REAL, "
00041                 "medianlat REAL, medianlon REAL)";
00042 
00043     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, gpssql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00044         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", gpssql, rc, errmsg);
00045         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00046         return -1;
00047     }
00048 
00049     const char obdsql[] = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS analysis.obdanalysis "
00050                 "(trip INTEGER UNIQUE, petrolusage REAL)";
00051 
00052     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, obdsql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00053         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", obdsql, rc, errmsg);
00054         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00055         return -1;
00056     }
00057 
00058     const char clustersql[] = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS analysis.clusterdistance "
00059                 "(tripA INTEGER, tripB INTEGER, meandist REAL, mediandist REAL)";
00060 
00061     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, clustersql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00062         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", obdsql, rc, errmsg);
00063         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00064         return -1;
00065     }
00066 
00067     return 0;
00068 }

00070 int resetTripAnalysisTables(sqlite3 *db) {
00071     int rc;
00072     char *errmsg;
00073 
00074 
00075     const char gpssql[] = "DELETE FROM analysis.gpsanalysis WHERE 1";
00076 
00077     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, gpssql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00078         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", gpssql, rc, errmsg);
00079         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00080         return -1;
00081     }
00082 
00083     const char obdsql[] = "DELETE FROM analysis.obdanalysis WHERE 1";
00084 
00085     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, obdsql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00086         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", obdsql, rc, errmsg);
00087         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00088         return -1;
00089     }
00090 
00091     const char clustersql[] = "DELETE FROM analysis.clusteranalysis WHERE 1";
00092 
00093     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, clustersql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00094         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s (%i): %s\n", clustersql, rc, errmsg);
00095         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00096         return -1;
00097     }
00098 
00099     return 0;
00100 }

00102 int meanMedianDistances(sqlite3 *db) {
00103     const char tripsql[] = "SELECT trip,meanlat,meanlon,medianlat,medianlon FROM "
00104                 "analysis.gpsanalysis WHERE trip>?";
00105 
00106     const char clustersql[] = "INSERT INTO analysis.clusterdistance "
00107                 "(tripA, tripB, meandist, mediandist) VALUES "
00108                 "(?,?,?,?) ";
00109 
00110     int rc;
00111     sqlite3_stmt *tripselect1, *tripselect2;
00112     sqlite3_stmt *insertcluster;
00113 
00114     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, tripsql, -1, &tripselect1, NULL);
00115 
00116     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00117         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create select statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00118                         tripsql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00119         return -1;
00120     }
00121 
00122     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, tripsql, -1, &tripselect2, NULL);
00123 
00124     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00125         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create select statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00126                         tripsql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00127         return -1;
00128     }
00129 
00130     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, clustersql, -1, &insertcluster, NULL);
00131 
00132     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00133         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create insert statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00134                         clustersql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00135         return -1;
00136     }
00137     sqlite3_bind_int(tripselect1, 1, -1);
00138 
00139     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(tripselect1)) {
00140         int tripA = sqlite3_column_int(tripselect1, 0);
00141         double meanlatA = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect1, 1);
00142         double meanlonA = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect1, 2);
00143         double medianlatA = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect1, 3);
00144         double medianlonA = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect1, 4);
00145 
00146         sqlite3_reset(tripselect2);
00147         sqlite3_bind_int(tripselect2, 1, tripA);
00148         while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(tripselect2)) {
00149             int tripB = sqlite3_column_int(tripselect2, 0);
00150             double meanlatB = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect2, 1);
00151             double meanlonB = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect2, 2);
00152             double medianlatB = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect2, 3);
00153             double medianlonB = sqlite3_column_double(tripselect2, 4);
00154 
00155             double meanCluster = haversine_dist(meanlatA, meanlonA, meanlatB, meanlonB);
00156             double medianCluster = haversine_dist(medianlatA, medianlonA, medianlatB, medianlonB);
00157 
00158             sqlite3_reset(insertcluster);
00159             sqlite3_bind_int(insertcluster, 1, tripA);
00160             sqlite3_bind_int(insertcluster, 2, tripB);
00161             sqlite3_bind_double(insertcluster, 3, meanCluster);
00162             sqlite3_bind_double(insertcluster, 3, medianCluster);
00163 
00164             sqlite3_step(insertcluster);
00165         }
00166     }
00167 
00168     sqlite3_finalize(insertcluster);
00169     sqlite3_finalize(tripselect1);
00170     sqlite3_finalize(tripselect2);
00171 
00172     return 0;
00173 }

00175 int insertTripAnalysis(sqlite3 *db, int trip, double length,
00176             double meanlat, double meanlon, double medianlat, double medianlon) {
00177     const char sql[] = "INSERT OR REPLACE INTO analysis.gpsanalysis "
00178                 "(trip, length, meanlat, meanlon, medianlat, medianlon) "
00179                 "VALUES "
00180                 "(?,?,?,?,?,?)";
00181 
00182     int rc;
00183     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00184 
00185     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00186 
00187     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00188         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create insert statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00189                         sql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00190         return -1;
00191     }
00192 
00193     sqlite3_bind_int(stmt, 1, trip);
00194     sqlite3_bind_double(stmt, 2, length);
00195     sqlite3_bind_double(stmt, 3, meanlat);
00196     sqlite3_bind_double(stmt, 4, meanlon);
00197     sqlite3_bind_double(stmt, 5, medianlat);
00198     sqlite3_bind_double(stmt, 6, medianlon);
00199 
00200     rc = sqlite3_step(stmt);
00201 
00202     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00203     return 0;
00204 }
00205 
00206 int getTripAnalysis(sqlite3 *db, int trip, double *length,
00207             double *meanlat, double *meanlon, double *medianlat, double *medianlon) {
00208 
00209     const char sql[] = "SELECT length, meanlat, meanlon, medianlat, medianlon "
00210                 "FROM analysis.gpsanalysis WHERE trip=?";
00211 
00212     int rc;
00213     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00214 
00215     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00216 
00217     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00218         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create select statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00219                         sql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00220         return -1;
00221     }
00222 
00223     sqlite3_bind_int(stmt, 1, trip);
00224 
00225     int retvalue = -1;
00226 
00227     if(SQLITE_ROW == (rc = sqlite3_step(stmt))) {
00228         if(NULL != length) {
00229             *length = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 0);
00230         }
00231         if(NULL != meanlat) {
00232             *meanlat = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 1);
00233         }
00234         if(NULL != meanlon) {
00235             *meanlon = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 2);
00236         }
00237         if(NULL != medianlat) {
00238             *medianlat = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 3);
00239         }
00240         if(NULL != medianlon) {
00241             *medianlon = sqlite3_column_double(stmt, 4);
00242         }
00243 
00244         retvalue = 0;
00245     }
00246 
00247     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00248     return retvalue;
00249 }
00250 
00251 int fillAnalysisTables(sqlite3 *db) {
00252     const char sql[] = "SELECT DISTINCT tripid FROM trip ORDER BY tripid";
00253 
00254     int rc;
00255     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00256 
00257     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00258 
00259     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00260         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create select statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00261                         sql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00262         return -1;
00263     }
00264 
00265     while(SQLITE_ROW == (rc = sqlite3_step(stmt))) {
00266         int trip = sqlite3_column_int(stmt, 0);
00267 
00268         double length=tripdist(db, trip);
00269         double meanlat=0;
00270         double meanlon=0;
00271         double medianlat=0;
00272         double medianlon=0;
00273 
00274         int status = tripmeanmedian(db, trip, &meanlat, &meanlon, &medianlat, &medianlon);
00275         if(0 == status) {
00276             insertTripAnalysis(db, trip, length, meanlat, meanlon, medianlat, medianlon);
00277         }
00278     }
00279 
00280     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00281 
00282     return 0;
00283 }
00284 
00285 int exportGpsCSV(sqlite3 *db, FILE *f) {
00286     const char sql[] = "SELECT * FROM analysis.gpsanalysis ORDER BY trip";
00287 
00288     int rc;
00289     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00290 
00291     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00292 
00293     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00294         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't create select statement \"%s\" (%i): %s\n",
00295                         sql, rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00296         return -1;
00297     }
00298 
00299     if(SQLITE_ROW != (sqlite3_step(stmt))) {
00300         fprintf(stderr, "No rows returned from gps analysis table\n");
00301         return -1;
00302     }
00303 
00304     int i;
00305     for(i=0;i<sqlite3_column_count(stmt);i++) {
00306         fprintf(f, "%s,", sqlite3_column_name(stmt, i));
00307     }
00308     fprintf(f, "\n");
00309 
00310     sqlite3_reset(stmt);
00311 
00312     while(SQLITE_ROW == (rc = sqlite3_step(stmt))) {
00313         for(i=0;i<sqlite3_column_count(stmt);i++) {
00314             fprintf(f, "%f,", sqlite3_column_double(stmt, i));
00315         }
00316         fprintf(f, "\n");
00317     }
00318 
00319     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00320 
00321     return 0;
00322 }
